mapper.sql: ID, CODE, NAME, SEX, AGE, TEL, HOBBY, CAREER_TYPE, WORK_UNIT, POSITION_LEVEL, MONTH_INCOME, MARRIAGE, SPOUSE_CAREER, SPOUSE_UNIT, FAMILY_STRUCTURE, FAMILY_NUM, CHILD_AGE, LIVING_PROVINCE, LIVING_CITY, LIVING_AREA, FAMILY_ADDRESS, WORK_ADDRESS, KNOW_WAY, HOUSE_PURPOSE, TOTAL_BUDGET, CREDIT_CONDITION, TARGET_PREMISES, TARGET_YT, TARGET_LAYOUT, TARGET_AREA, ACCEPT_P1, ACCEPT_P2, ACCEPT_P3, RESISTANCE, COMPETITOR, VISIT_TIME, SALE_TEAM, PROPERTY_CONSULTANT, REGISTRANT, STATE, REMARK, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, EXPAND_TIME, EXPAND_PROPERTY_CON, IMP_CUSTOMER, CHANNEL_CODE, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_DICT_ITEM DI WHERE DI.CODE=STATE AND DICT_CODE='CUSTOMER_STATE') AS STATE_NAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from base_customer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into base_customer (ID, CODE, NAME, SEX, AGE, TEL, HOBBY, CAREER_TYPE, WORK_UNIT, POSITION_LEVEL, MONTH_INCOME, MARRIAGE, SPOUSE_CAREER, SPOUSE_UNIT, FAMILY_STRUCTURE,
